weekly_top_story.headline: India and Russia deepen ties with 23rd Annual Summit focusing on trade, defense, and technology
weekly_top_story.summary: During the 23rd Annual India-Russia Summit, leaders Modi and Putin agreed on ambitious trade targets for 2030 and enhanced cooperation in defense co-production and technology, signaling a strategic partnership amid global geopolitical shifts.

stories.headline: Pentagon reports bombing of another boat in Eastern Pacific amid drug trafficking claims
stories.summary: The US Pentagon announced destroying a boat allegedly carrying drugs in the Eastern Pacific, resulting in four deaths, though no evidence supporting the claims was provided, raising concerns about transparency in military actions.

stories.headline: Russian President Putin pledges uninterrupted fuel supply to India despite US pressures
stories.summary: In response to US sanctions and pressures, Putin vowed to maintain continuous fuel shipments to India, underscoring the resilience of the Russia-India energy partnership amid international tension.
